Class ScoreSheet

  • java.lang.Object
    • ScoreSheet

  • public class ScoreSheet
extends java.lang.Object
    This class computes the values for a score sheet in a game of Yahtzee. It automatically is updated for dice with more or less than 6 sides. No sources to cite.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ScoreSheet(Hand hand, Config config)
      Constructor that creates a new ScoreSheet object and uses the given Hand and Config objects to calculate and store the players' scores.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void calcScores()
      Method that calculates the scores of each section of the ScoreSheet
      int getLength()
      Method that returns the length of the ScoreSheet
      void printScore()
      Method that calculates and prints the scores of the upper and lower sections, and the total score for the scoresheet
      void printSheet()
      Method that prints out the ScoreSheet
      int scoreAt(int line)
      Method that gives the score at a given line of the ScoreSheet
      boolean setScore(int line, int score)
      Method that gives the score at a given line of the ScoreSheet
